en.name: Fried Rice Jawa
howToCook: 3. Put in the rice, try cold rice
4. Add salt, powdered stock, pepper, king sauce, micin to taste
5. Enter the vegetables cut into small pieces
6. Add a little sweet soy sauce
7. Enter the chicken that has been cut into small pieces
